steps.title: The best way to contact President Trump is through his official website.
steps.content: The best way to contact President Trump is through his official website . On his website, you can share your thoughts with President Trump or his wife Melania Trump, invite either or both of them to participate in an event thrown by your organization, or request a greeting for special occasions like birthdays, military retirements, or weddings. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Email press requests to the Trump Organization or his campaign website.
steps.content: Email press requests to the Trump Organization or his campaign website . If you’re a member of a media organization and you’d like to request more information, you can send an email to either the Trump Organization or his residential campaign team to reach a press representative directly. [2] X Research source Trump Organization: press@trumporg.com Donaldjtrump.com : press@djtfp24.com

steps.title: Comment, tag, or message President Trump on social media.
steps.content: Comment, tag, or message President Trump on social media. While this isn’t the best way to contact him directly, commenting on President Trump’s social media posts might catch his attention. There’s no guarantee he’ll respond, but it might be worth a shot! Here’s everything you can find him on: Truth Social Facebook Instagram X (formerly known as Twitter) Rumble YouTube

steps.title: Mail a letter to the Trump Organization at 725 Fifth Avenue New York, NY 10022.
steps.content: Mail a letter to the Trump Organization at 725 Fifth Avenue New York, NY 10022. If you have general thoughts you'd like to share, a business proposal to give to the Trump Organization, or a real estate development proposal, you can send a letter and your contact information to this mailing address. [3] X Research source The Trump family doesn’t receive any email or phone messages through the Trump Organization.

steps.title: Unfortunately, President Trump does not receive emails from the public.
steps.content: Unfortunately, President Trump does not receive emails from the public. The only official way to contact Donald Trump is through his official Presidential website . However, you can still email any press requests to donaldjtrump.com or to the Trump Organization. [4] X Research source
